description: Daily Rolling Forecast: Read daily RFC data from Google Sheets and write to PostgreSQL
comment: This layout reads from 'Daily Overall' sheet and stores in rfc_daily table with append mode

inputSources.name: daily_rfc
inputSources.comment: Daily RFC data range starting from row 2 (skips header)

outputs.name: postgres
outputs.deleteCondition: (date IS NULL OR game IS NULL) OR EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2026
outputs.comment: Append mode with delete condition for idempotent updates
